infos.value: Do you not find it strange?
Though the castle gates have come under attack, why are they so lightly guarded?
We've already told you, you needn't worry.
The fools have clearly fallen for Lady Miranda's diversion and are all back behind the castle.
...Then that means it's on us to take down these gates!
And once we do...we shall join forces with Mont's party inside the castle!
